report: greetings. I had heard somewhere on this internet the idiotic notion that taking six benadryls made for a most astounding organism. finding this interesting, I decided to try this myself. I took six. now first of all benadryl is a sedative so I can't hardly move on high dosages. I tried the orgasm on six benadryls and besides the uncomfortable feeling that I was being watched, it felt like I was a machine that was malfunctioning. it was unpleasant in other words. That was the worst feeling orgasm ever.
